title: Dancing with the Devil
description: I saved her once.And now she thinks I'm the hero. Ivy Blackwood is a young queen. In our world, women aren't given power, but Ivy was given all of it and then some.She's been spoiled rotten by her father.She can have anything her little heart desires, but her eyes are set on me.All of her power is attracting wolves. They're chasing after her now, and all she does is watch with amusement from her throne.She believes herself to be untouchable.It's up to me to step in. Again.She thinks I'll come to her rescue every time, but who will rescue her when it's my calloused hands that are muffling her screams?Welcome to 'Kingdoms.' Each book is a fairy-tale based contemporary standalone set in the criminal underworld of Chicago. Book 3 is a loose modern adaptation of Persephone and Hades' story. If you like your romance steamy and bordering on the dark side with twists that will have your heart racing, you've come to the right place. HEA always.
author: Aria R. Blue
